body.name: Freeman Restorative Moisturizer + Hydrating Skin Facial Shield, Lightweight Face Serum, Infused With Aloe Vera & Ceramides, Soothes & Calms, Relieves Dry Skin, 3 fl.oz./ 89 mL Bottle
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 19 hrs 55 mins
features: The Freeman Restorative Moisturizer Hydrating Skin Shield helps to soothe irritated skin from environmental stressors and relieve dryness
Perfect lightweight daily moisturizer for sensitive skin
Aloe helps to soothe the skin
Ceramides help to lock in moisture
Made with our Restorative Moisture Formula Technology that improves the overall look and feel of skin
Fatty acids protect skin against environmental damage
body.description: What is the Freeman Restorative Moisturizer & Hydrating Skin Shield? It is a lightweight moisturizer that helps to soothe irritated skin from environmental stressors and relieve dryness. We love this facial moisturizer as it is the perfect daily moisturizer for sensitive skin. Aloe helps to soothe your skin, while Ceramides help to lock in moisture on your face. Our skincare treatments are made with a Restorative Moisture Formula to improve the overall look and feel of your skin! The fatty acids protect your skin against environmental damage, while glycerin supports the skin’s natural barrier. The PH buffer promotes balanced skin. Since 1976, we’ve created feel-good formulas that seriously work (without losing all the fun!). We believe skincare belongs to everyone and strive to democratize beauty with affordable products. In our minds, clear skin = a clear conscious. Our top priority is ensuring our products are efficacious and full of good-for-you ingredients. Our new formulas are always dermatologist tested, free of parabens, sulfates, phthalates and mineral oil. We love our furry friends, too, and are proudly cruelty-free and never test on animals. From breakouts and blemishes to sensitive and dull complexions, we’re here to educate you on how to take care of your unique skin. We believe skincare is more than a routine... It’s about feeling good from the inside out!

Our skincare treatments are made with a Restorative Moisture Formula!

Restorative Moisturizer + Hydrating Skin Shield Restorative Glow Booster Serum + Makeup Primer Restorative Facial Cleanser + Mask Restorative Facial Exfoliator + Cleanser Restorative Rich Cream + Overnight Leave-On Treatment Restorative Eye Cream + Overnight Leave-On Treatment Shop The Full Skincare Routine Lightweight moisturizer infused with Aloe and Ceramides that helps to soothe irritated skin from environmental stressors and relieve dryness. A lightweight hydrating facial serum and makeup primer that helps to soften, brighten, and smooth skin for longer lasting makeup and a dewy, glow. A multi-action cleanser that acts as both a cleanser and purifying mask to gently remove makeup and support the health, texture and integrity of skin. Resurfacing facial scrub infused with oatmeal and walnut that helps to deep clean and refine rough skin, while restoring natural skin hydration. A sumptuous facial rich cream leave-on moisturizer to use during the day or night to help hydrate the driest of skin and smooth away roughness. A sumptuous leave-on rich overnight eye cream treatment that infused with hyaluronic acid that helps to brighten and depuff sensitive under eye skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh hydration for an incredible price!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product to hydrate the area around the eyes and help make bags under the eyes less visible, it arrived on time, perfectly sealed and with complete contents. It is easy to apply with a gel-like texture that is absorbed quickly, leaving a very pleasant sensation of freshness. The aroma is pleasant and very faint. I like its hyaluronic acid content because it is a very effective moisturizer. It is suitable for many applications. The price is Incredibly affordable for such a good quality cream, I am very happy with this purchase, and I will buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent night cream
reviews.reviewText: I use this 30 minutes before going to bed and when I wake up I am duwey and hydrated. This is okay product for tired skin. I love how easily accessible Freeman products are for all level of income. I've been using this brand since 1993 and they don't disappoint. However I do feel that the Peel off products had changed their formulas since then. I am glad they are having set of creams and serums that make skincare available for all income status. You don't need to overspent for good skin.This cream is smooth and a little goes a long way and spreads easily. I use a dime size amount each night, focusing on the forehead and chin area. I had noticed more hydrated skin than usual. My forehead tends to crack due to driness. This helps so much. The smell isn't over powering and if you use a little it wouldn't be sticky. Make sure you let it absorb into skin before going to bed. Again a little goes a long way. This jar can last a year or more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a miracle product, but it works!
reviews.reviewText: It's good for the price. Fragrance free. Nice thick/rich formula. Moisturizing. Non irritating. I didn't notice any difference in fine lines or eye bags, but it did help moisturize. I don't really have eye bags or wrinkles, maybe just some very fine lines (the start of a very few). I'm 37, for reference. I got this for a preventative , but I didn't notice much, but hydration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've tried other Freeman face products, specifically the Skin Shield moisturizer, & I love it, so based on the reviews of this eye cream, how great the face moisturizer is, & the excellent price, I had to try the eye cream. I am just as impressed with it as I am the face moisturizer. It goes on so easily, no tugging on the skin at all, it is not heavy, works great under makeup, & my eye area stays moisturized all day long. Some eye creams make the skin around your eyes feel tight & dry shortly after you apply it, but this cream does not. I had zero eye irritation whatsoever, which for me is important due to having very sensitive skin around my eyes. A little goes a long way, so the small container of the product will go a VERY long way. Don't hesitate to buy this little gem of a product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: The hydration is fine, nothing life changing, but for the price it’s fair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, especially for the price
reviews.reviewText: I'll admit, I did not have high hopes for this cream but I'm pleasantly surprised. It's thick & creamy so a little goes a long way but it absorbs fast and doesn't leave any kind of residue. I'd purchase this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for price
reviews.reviewText: Snagged at $3.82 on prime day. I have sensitive skin and it has not caused me any breakouts. Been using for over 2 months now, not every day but about 3-4 times a week. Excellent little moisturizer, works as a decent skin shield/barrier. No burn. Just cleaning, non greasy fresh feeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There is a reason this eye cream is so inexpensive. I bought it on a whim after running out of my normal eye cream. Used it for about 2 weeks with no issues but woke up one day and my eyelid seemed a little irritated. Throughout the day, it seemed to turn pink and look almost slightly swollen. The next morning, I woke up and it was very swollen and tender to the touch. It’s been about 2 weeks since this has happened and my eye is still not back to normal. It was swollen for days, still very sensitive and I am only able to put vitamin e oil on it without pain.
